ygData.subject: Re: Hunting at 26 and looking to hit 29th fast.....
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Millers in the Hills: very good exp and loot but it is a pain in the butt to keep their spawn apart and they rip my pet big time..... Is the new darkness
ygData.messageBody:
> From: "Dino Buffetta" <DBuffett@...>
>
> What else can I hunt solo to go from 26-29 fast ? I am now hunting the
Millers in the Hills: very good exp and loot but it is a pain in the butt to
keep their spawn apart and they rip my pet big time..... Is the new darkness
and heat blood at 29th that much better??

I did the Millers to 29 as well, but that was before the DOT patch, and I
had jboots...you might want to try a darkness/blood/fear combo, *then* send
the pet...

Yes, the lvl 29th darkness and blood are *awesome* darkness will slow the
mob to a walk at best, add in venom of the snake and invoke fear at 34 and
you've got a *nasty* dot/fear combo that will let you solo whites.
